channel.title: Vekllei on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in Vekllei on MillMint

item.title: Mirah
item.description: The Borough of Mirah 🧊 BOROUGH Guide Tzipora and Cobian in the town of Gigayeh, in the Mirah Borough Gigayeh had beautiful empty beaches, littered with icebergs that caught the light like jewels, but Tzipora couldn’t swim and the water was freezing. They could have enjoyed café food in the sun, but Cobian’s regimented home life had left her incapable of eating outside of her designated meals, and Tzipora could only drink so much coffee.

item.title: Economy
item.description: Economics in Vekllei 🪙 ARTICLE Documents 🌺 Note from the Editor Ever wondered how Vekllei people sound and talk? As it turns out, it’s something like Inuktitut blended with French, pronounced by an Australian. This article introduces key Vekllei languages. ⭐ Starred Article This article is complete. It was last updated in November 2020. 1. Overview # Introduction # 2. History # 3. The Bureau System # Overview # There are many thousands of companies busy with work in Vekllei.

item.title: Language
item.description: Language in Vekllei 📮 ARTICLE Documents 1. Overview # 🌺 Note from the Editor Ever wondered how Vekllei people sound and talk? It turns out it’s a mess of things. This article introduces key Vekllei languages. 📯 Starred Article This article is complete. It was last updated in December 2020. The language of Vekllei is an important part of the project. Utopianism cascades through every part of society, and rethinking communication is a foundational part of that instinct.

item.title: Religion
item.description: Religion in Vekllei 🌋 ARTICLE Documents 1. Overview # 🌺 Note from the Editor This is a comprehensive article on the religion of Vekllei. If you’re looking for an article on the country, click here. 🚚 Under Construction This page is still under construction, and is incomplete. Coming soon are passages on the history, practice and traditions of Upen. Upen is the nondenominational animistic spiritualism of Vekllei.
